activities:
We operate a number of sweepstakes sites, some of which are available to users in the EU/EEA.  Entrants to our sweepstakes must provide their email address in order to enter.

If an entrant wins a sweepstakes, they must also provide their postal address information so that the prize can be mailed to this person.
personaldata: Site visitor email data, site visitor clickstream data, and occasionally site visitor mailing address data and personal demographic information.
privacyprograms: We conduct a self-regulatory privacy program to make sure that we conform to the privacy principles promulgated in our privacy stamement.
recoursemech: We use the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
